room_title: Escape room "Guardian of the Scroll - Chapter 1" by Enchanted Escape Room in Los Angeles
room_description: Deep in the belly of the creature lies hidden scrolls of prophecy that foretells of a hero that will end the great war. Drakon, the kings greatest enemy, has tried for thousands of years to destroy the scrolls but has never succeeded. The guardian of the scrolls has deemed you worthy to enter, but there is one problem. You must get the scrolls within an hour before the location collapses and disappears for the next 1000 years. You must find the scrolls of prophecy so that you can defeat Drakon and end the great war.
